about.summary: Get the time series index (date or date-time component), time series signature (feature extraction of date or date-time component for time series machine learning), and time series summary (summary attributes about time series). Create future time series based on properties of existing time series index using logistic regression. Coerce between time-based tibbles ('tbl') and 'xts', 'zoo', and 'ts'. Methods discussed herein are commonplace in machine learning, and have been cited in various literature. Refer to "Calendar Effects" in papers such as Taieb, Souhaib Ben. "Machine learning strategies for multi-step-ahead time series forecasting." Universit Libre de Bruxelles, Belgium (2014): 75-86. <http://souhaib-bentaieb.com/pdf/2014_phd.pdf>.

Get the time series index (date or date-time component), time series signature (feature extraction of date or date-time component for time series machine learning), and time series summary (summary attributes about time series). Create future time series based on properties of existing time series index using logistic regression. Coerce between time-based tibbles ('tbl') and 'xts', 'zoo', and 'ts'. Methods discussed herein are commonplace in machine learning, and have been cited in various literature. Refer to "Calendar Effects" in papers such as Taieb, Souhaib Ben. "Machine learning strategies for multi-step-ahead time series forecasting." Universit Libre de Bruxelles, Belgium (2014): 75-86. <http://souhaib-bentaieb.com/pdf/2014_phd.pdf>.

name: r-timetk
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = "2.8.3" %}
{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}
{% set native = 'm2w64-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-timetk
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/timetk_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/timetk/timetk_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 3e22e5f731856226a3261b7bbbd48c2c2a80d53277cd45eb0da82a64d4c2a5a9

build:
  merge_build_host: true  # [win]
  number: 1
  noarch: generic
  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ posix }}zip               # [win]
    - cross-r-base {{ r_base }}    # [build_platform != target_platform]
  host:
    - r-base
    - r-anytime
    - r-assertthat
    - r-dplyr >=1.0.0
    - r-forcats
    - r-forecast
    - r-generics
    - r-ggplot2
    - r-hms
    - r-lubridate >=1.6.0
    - r-padr >=0.5.2
    - r-plotly
    - r-purrr >=0.2.2
    - r-readr >=1.3.0
    - r-recipes >=0.1.4
    - r-rlang >=0.4.7
    - r-rsample
    - r-slider
    - r-stringi >=1.4.6
    - r-stringr
    - r-tibble >=3.0.3
    - r-tidyr >=1.1.0
    - r-tidyselect >=1.1.0
    - r-timedate
    - r-tsfeatures
    - r-xts >=0.9_7
    - r-zoo >=1.7_14
  run:
    - r-base
    - r-anytime
    - r-assertthat
    - r-dplyr >=1.0.0
    - r-forcats
    - r-forecast
    - r-generics
    - r-ggplot2
    - r-hms
    - r-lubridate >=1.6.0
    - r-padr >=0.5.2
    - r-plotly
    - r-purrr >=0.2.2
    - r-readr >=1.3.0
    - r-recipes >=0.1.4
    - r-rlang >=0.4.7
    - r-rsample
    - r-slider
    - r-stringi >=1.4.6
    - r-stringr
    - r-tibble >=3.0.3
    - r-tidyr >=1.1.0
    - r-tidyselect >=1.1.0
    - r-timedate
    - r-tsfeatures
    - r-xts >=0.9_7
    - r-zoo >=1.7_14

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('timetk')"           # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('timetk')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: https://github.com/business-science/timetk
  license: GPL-3.0-or-later
  summary: "Get the time series index (date or date-time component), time series signature (feature extraction of date or date-time component for time series machine learning), and time series summary (summary attributes about time series). Create future time series based on properties of existing time series index using\
    \ logistic regression. Coerce between time-based tibbles ('tbl') and 'xts', 'zoo', and 'ts'. Methods discussed herein are commonplace in machine learning, and have been cited in various literature. Refer to \"Calendar Effects\" in papers such as Taieb, Souhaib Ben. \"Machine learning strategies for multi-step-ahead time\
    \ series forecasting.\" Universit Libre de Bruxelles, Belgium (2014): 75-86. <http://souhaib-bentaieb.com/pdf/2014_phd.pdf>."
  license_family: GPL3
  license_file:
    - {{ environ["PREFIX"] }}/lib/R/share/licenses/GPL-3

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - mxr-conda
    - conda-forge/r
    - oblute
    - rluria14
    - benhuff

# Description: Get the time series index (date or date-time component), time series signature (feature extraction of date or date-time component for time series machine learning), and time series summary (summary attributes about time series). Create future time series based on properties of existing time series index using logistic regression. Coerce between time-based tibbles ('tbl') and 'xts', 'zoo', and 'ts'. Methods discussed herein are commonplace in machine learning, and have been cited in various literature. Refer to "Calendar Effects" in papers such as Taieb, Souhaib Ben. "Machine learning strategies for multi-step-ahead time series forecasting." Universit Libre de Bruxelles, Belgium (2014): 75-86. <http://souhaib-bentaieb.com/pdf/2014_phd.pdf>.
